name: Found Online Solutions
tagline: Quality Web Services at Small Business Prices
description:
Not only do we get your business FOUND online, but TRUSTED online with a growing reputation. We finish what web designers often leave incomplete - proper SEO and integration with other optimized online media like Video and Document sites.
We do what it takes to put your business on the map, to rank better on first page of Google, Bing, and Yahoo search results, and converting traffic into customers with lead-generating local websites, local directories, and other web properties.
